overview: Susan Hustace, has been a serial entrepreneur since 1995 with a focus on animation, digital art, interface design and real estate investment. Over the last three years she helped build and run Robot-Tractor.com, an e-commerce toy store. Her bachelorâ€™s degree from The University of Texas and many years of additional training and education, combined with 12 years of entrepreneurial experience will be a valuable asset during the development stages of SmilesIncluded.com. Susan created the SmilesIncluded name and logo design, and helped develop and refine the site concept, mission/goals, organization, specifications, and business strategies. She will be the primary interface with our development team on design and functionality to ensure that the site supports our objective of providing an unparalleled user experience that is both compelling and enjoyable.
